cards.name: Pidgeot Spirit Link
text: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Pidgeot-EX.

cards.name: Pokédex
text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

text: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.
